documents.document: Catching up on #ChicagoPD good to see the awesome Aussie director Cherie Nowlan directing an ep.
#MKR2017 let's see what comments they make about 'babies being ugh' tonight.
Yay to The Matrix. I'll just forget how the damn trilogy ended. ðŸ˜ˆ https://t.co/1qvh9mnj2k
But apart from that nitpick it's the start of a strong back half of #800words
Only nitpick I have is in the previous ep which is based the previous day, George had his wedding ring on & now it's gone. #800words
Aww happy George and go Monty! Time to rip up that questionnaire and try to find some happiness until Jan drops her bombshell. #800words
And I won't be watching 50 Shades tomorrow night. I'd take watching paint dry over that.
The hand will feel better after some TLC Fiona... #800words
This was not good parenting. Heh. #800words
Poor Constable Tom. He was feeding his ðŸ¦† in the midst of serenity. #800words
Absolutely love the score playing over the fight scene. #800words
Fight. Fight. Fight. ðŸ’ªðŸ‘ŠðŸ’ª oh and Fiona throws a mean punch. If they need a new rugby player see Monty! #800words
Go Monty! ðŸ’ª #800words
Woody I haven't taught them that yet! ðŸ˜‚ #800words
Can Fiona smack that smug look off Robbie's face? #800words
Damn. I should have played Oz Lotto would have had 5 numbers. ðŸ˜¬
Great George/Katie scene coming up. George can't find his place in terms of relationships and attempting to be happy again. #800words
Woody see what happens when you put your foot in your mouth. #800words
If I was you Robbie I would hide. Though you deserve what is coming to you in this episode... #800words
Even though I prefer George and Fiona as a couple, absolutely love Katie. #800words
The whole point of a soulmate is that there is only one of them. #800words
Woody. Foot meet mouth. Better quit while you're ahead.... #800words
Oh hey Arlo, yeah that's how you want to find out about your father's new potential relationship. Heh. #800words
@Ryno_091 very easy to do!
Can I just say I absolutely love Monty and Fiona in this episode? For different reasons but ðŸ’ª #800words
So many double meanings in this episode... #800words
Okay #mkr comes to an end while #800words starts...
Live tweeting of #800words may occur from me. That's if I don't get absorbed in it like the first time I watched it weeks ago. ðŸ˜

Hey it's Burnie. I know that place, bought an investment property last year about 40 mins from there. #mkr
A few hours ago Aussie fans were praising Hazlewood for his almost speccie catch, now he's being slamming for losing the match. #NZvAUS

Been a cracking match even if my fav Federer won't win it. Time to switch off since I am on the road tomorrow. Buonanotte!

Warner's basically playing on one leg and possibly one arm, but sure no problem to be at 174n.o. #AUSvPAK
That montage though at the end of #CodeBlack "Unfinished Business" is a must watch.
By last week I meant #CodeBlack's last ep from 2 weeks ago. Then again, due to Sweeps starting, half the shows I watch aren't on this week.
Catching up on #CodeBlack and loved last week's episode from Guthrie's POV.
@JennySok damn I loved Lewis and Inspector Morse.
@dennisupdike same, along with theirs and there's. Hence my annoyance when autocorrect kicked in!
@dennisupdike see the tweet I made after that about my grammatical error before replying next time.
Please disregard the damn grammatical error in my previous tweets. Autocorrect changed it from its to it's...
Pretty cool stat that three actresses for The Help got nominated for their films.. #OscarNoms
@sugarshaz19 yep well usually she gets past the nomination stage and falls at the last hurdle.
Her performance along with Stone were by far the ones that stood out for me even though I was suffering from heat exhaustion at the time...
Something quite odd when a film like Arrival gets nominated (deservedly so) for Best Picture but it's lead is snubbed... #OscarNoms
Master class tonight. ðŸ‘ https://t.co/B2MzVxpv12

Seeing Jill Hennessy playing the baddie on #theblacklist was a delight.
@Ryno_091 well The Investigator will probably be paired up with Murder Uncovered as well. TBD in a couple of weeks I guess!
@Ryno_091 yep to your prediction for Wed. It can be hard to predict because of 7Flix with their dedicated dramas etc.
Bones is after 800 Words on a Tuesday on Channel 7. Only questionable day later on will be a Wed at this stage and post-Hoges on a Sunday.
I know Stan the Man will probably get through but I would love Fed, Kei or Tsonga or make the final over him. #AusOpen
